===Friendly Fracas===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Kinich)
:{{A|vo card kinich invite easy 01.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Sure thing. I've played a few rounds of this game before.
:{{A|vo card ajaw invite easy 01.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' And you only won because of me!
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Let me adjust my deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)

;(When the player defeats one of Kinich's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card kinich ingame easy 02.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' I let my guard down.

;(When the player defeats two of Kinich's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card ajaw ingame easy 03.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' KINICH, you moron! What was that?

;(When Kinich defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card ajaw ingame easy 01.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' Mwahahaha! Praise the Almighty Dragonlord, K'uhul Ajaw!

;(When Kinich uses an Elemental Burst)

;(If the player wins the match)

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card ajaw invite easy 02.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' Victory! All thanks to the Almighty Dragonlord, K'uhul Ajaw! Muahahaha!
:{{A|vo card kinich invite easy 02.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Keep on telling yourself that.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Serious Showdown===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Kinich)
:{{A|vo card ajaw invite hard 01.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' Remember, lowly servant &ndash; you can't lose with the Almighty Dragonlord by your side!
:{{A|vo card kinich invite hard 01.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Hmm, that doesn't seem like a fair game. I think you should leave, then.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Let me adjust my deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Kinich's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card ajaw ingame hard 02.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' Told you that was the wrong move!

;(When the player defeats two of Kinich's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card kinich ingame hard 03.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' ...Huh, not looking good.

;(When Kinich defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card kinich ingame hard 01.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Not a bad start.

;(When Kinich uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|vo card ajaw ingame hard 04.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' Muahahaha! Victory is ours!

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card ajaw invite hard 03.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' Looks like your stupidity knows no bounds, Kinich! You actually lost with a hand like that? Hah, I don't even know what to say.
:{{A|vo card kinich invite hard 03.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Either step up or shut up.

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card kinich invite hard 02.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' You seemed distracted. Was Ajaw being too loud? Let's go another round, just the two of us.
:{{A|vo card ajaw invite hard 02.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' I was giving you advice, you heartless ingrate!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Guest Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Kinich)
:{{A|vo card ajaw freetalk 01.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' Hah, all eyes are on me! Lowly servants, behold the Almighty Dragonlord's magnificence!
:{{A|vo card kinich freetalk 01.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Yeah, a loud, glowing bug... Not something you see every day.
:{{A|vo card ajaw freetalk 02.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' Kiniiiiiich! I dare you to say that again!
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...
::{{A|vo card kinich leave 01.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' I have some errands to run, so I should get going.
::{{A|vo card ajaw leave 01.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' Yeah, work yourself to the bone, smart guy...

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card kinich endofgame win 01.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Well, that was a lucky win. Want to play another round?
:{{A|vo card ajaw endofgame win 01.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' Gah, you're so boring! You won, and you're not even gonna gloat?

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card ajaw endofgame fail 01.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' You're hopeless! The Almighty Dragonlord, K'uhul Ajaw's wisdom is wasted on you!
:{{A|vo card kinich endofgame fail 01.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' No one asked for your "wisdom."
{{Dialogue End}}
